section.name: Joda Money
section.p: Joda-Money provides a library of classes to store amounts of money. This library is intended to act as the base layer, providing classes that should be in the JDK. Classes to handle the intricacies of financial transactions are not included.
Joda Money is licensed under the business-friendly Apache 2.0 licence.

section.name: Documentation
section.p:
Various documentation is available:
The javadoc for the current release
The Subversion repository

section.name: Releases
section.p: There are no dependencies beyond JDK 1.5.

section.name: Support
section.p: Support on bugs, library usage or enhancement requests is available on a best efforts basis via:

ul.li: the joda-money-interest mailing list. Due to spam, you must be subscribed to post to the mailing list.
